definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: small, young, unimportant;— abs. ´[[ק]]: Ge 9:24 +; sf. [[קְטַנׇּם]] (Kö:ii.l,74) Je 6:13 + ; fs. [[קְטַנׇּה]] Ge 29:16 +; mpl. [[קְטַנִּים]] 2Ki 18:24 +; cstr. [[קְטַנֵּי]] 1Sa 9:21 (v. Dr; We conj. [[נִּי]]-, old cstr., cf, HPS), Pr 30:24; fpl. [[קְטַנּוֹת]] Ez Eze 16:61 +;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of children, youth = young, Ge 44:20 (J) 2Sa 9:12, 1Ki 11:17, 2Ki 2:23, 2Ki 5:2, of sister Ct So 8:8; = younger, of two children (oft. opp. [[גדול]]), Ge 9:24, Ge 27:15, Ge 27:42 (all J), Ge 29:16, Ge 29:18 (E), 1Sa 14:49 (f.; opp. [[הַכְּכִירָה]]); of younger sister Ju Jdg 15:2, so (fig.) Ez Eze 16:46 and (+ [[מִן]] comp.) v:Eze 16:61; brother 1Ch 24:31; ´[[הַקּ]]: youngest son (of several) 1Sa 16:11, 1Sa 17:14; [[גׇּדוֹל]] = young and old (v. [[קָטׂן]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of things : utterance Nu 22:18 (E), weight De 25:13, De 25:14, vessels 2Ch 36:18, animals Ps 104:25 (all opp. [[גדול]]); cf. also 2Sa 12:3, 1Ki 2:20, 1Ki 17:13, 1Ki 18:44, 2Ki 4:10, Ez Eze 43:14 (opp. [[גדול]]), Pr 30:24, Ct So 2:15, + prob. Ez Eze 46:22 (v. II. [[[קָטַר]]]); [[כְּלֵי]] [[הַקָּטָן]] Is 22:24 the vessels of small size (fig.).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with added idea of weakness, pers. 2Ki 18:24 = Is 36:9, city Ec 9:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = insignificant, (I) tribe 1Sa 9:21; (2) pers. (+[[נדול]]; = all persons) Je 6:13, Je 31:34, Jon 3:5, Ps 115:13, Es 1:5, Es 1:20, cf . 1Ch 12:14 (van d. H. v:1Ch 12:13); (3) in gen., [[יוֹם קְטַנּוֹת]] Zec 4:10 day of small things.—Vid. also  [[קָטׂן]].
